description: Styles for a dropdown component with various button, menu, and item states.

classes.name: kavia-dropdown
classes.description: Wrapper class for the dropdown component.

classes.name: kavia-dropdown__button
classes.description: Button styling for the dropdown component, including hover and focus states.

classes.name: kavia-dropdown__menu
classes.description: Menu styling for dropdown items, including positioning and animations.

classes.name: kavia-dropdown__item
classes.description: Styling for individual dropdown items, including hover and active states.

classes.name: kavia-dropdown__icon
classes.description: Styling for icons in the dropdown button.

classes.name: kavia-dropdown__arrow
classes.description: Styling for the dropdown arrow indication.
